history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transportation
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving directions
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Okay, going to pittsburghers for public transit. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER 115 Jackson Street, Glenshaw, Pennsylvania
TTS Okay, leaving from 115 jackson st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER No.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER No today.
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER No today.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER now to go
TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER CMU
TTS Okay, going to carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER 115 Jackson Street, Glenshaw, Pennsylvania
TTS Okay, leaving from 115 jackson st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER Right now today.
TTS Okay, travelling at 10:27 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 24 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 2 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Highland avenue + Jackson. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
